Anyway, Be safe out the, there are people who would like to call you child predators and would have no problem hurting you under the guise of 'justice' be weary and stay safe. Dont fall onto the path of CP as it will hurt you and others and possibly lead to extreme and permanent repercussions. Such as prison time, death while in prison due to violence, permanent discrimination from others, being the victim of hate crimes, and always having to identify as a child predator.

@everyone if you want to know, there was a profile that had a pfp of CP when someone commented on it he started defending himself in a really vulgar way. He has since deleted hi comments. Let us all hope that he got the necessary help that he needed.  I will repeat it again as to not be misunderstood, fiction and reality are different things as all of us know, if you like lolicon (which is fiction) you are fine and are making use of an outlet so as to not offend and there are even people who like lolicon and have no will to offend, while CP (which is real) is not okay as it makes use of real children. I might be beating a dead horse as im sure everyone here knows this but i felt in light of the situation if felt the need to say it nonetheless.

I understand that it must be hard to not react with anger when everyone is telling you you are wrong, but CP is wrong, and even though i understand does not mean its not wrong. I am not trying to provoke you but you must know that CP is wrong because its not fiction its real and no real child should be subjected to that or seen in an obscene way as they are children. Lolicon is different. Stick to loli and get help if you need it.

Lolicon is in my opinion, an okay outlet for those who are into it as it provides an outlet for people who have such fantasies so as to not act on them in real life. But actual CP is disgusting and if you are similar to @Ilovelittlegirlanuses  then you need to get help, pedophilia is a disease, i don't and wont hate you if you are attracted to real CP but its not okay and you need to understand that fact in order to get the necessary help, such as therapy.
